author: Ricky Scaparo
title: Has judgment begun in the House of God? Why have so many church leaders fallen?
text:
( OPINION ) ‚ÄúAre all the leaders in the American church corrupt?!,‚Äù is a question I ask myself on an almost daily basis.
News seem to come out weekly about yet another major ministry figure in the church being involved in some form of scandal.
The findings released about Mike Bickle have left the entire charismatic world swirling.
The pain, confusion, and disillusionment that many are feeling in light of these revelations have formed an entirely new branch of quasi‚ÄìChristianity I call the ‚Äúantichurch‚Äù movement,
who pride themselves on their ability to ‚Äúdeconstruct‚Äù ‚Äî which seems to always lead them towards the political left in the end or at least hobnobbing with it.
While to some extent this is an understandable reaction to betrayal, I would like to propose to you a different way.
In order to discuss where we should go, first we must look at where we‚Äôve been.
With so many victims coming forward as witnesses to abhorrent sins in leaders‚Äô lives, we have to ask ourselves: How did we get here?
To figure that out, we need to look at where the current leaders of the church came from, namely, the Hippie Movement.
Prior to the Hippies, America was a fairly conservative nation. But a counterculture began that encouraged rebellion against the values of the previous generation and instead pursued ‚Äúsex, drugs & rock ‚Äòn roll‚Äù.
Like all sin, this seemed to start out great for them, but in the end, it left them feeling hopeless, empty, and broken.
Then came the ‚ÄúJesus People.‚Äù God began to call many in their lost and broken generation to Himself, and a revival started that produced most of the leaders of the Charismatic church today.
While God can deliver anyone from the chains of their past, the devil is patient and tries to wear us down over time.
Having leaders with pasts filled with prolific sexual sin didn‚Äôt help the situation we find ourselves in.
I‚Äôm not sure if every leader that‚Äôs being exposed right now started out with nefarious intentions or not, but I do believe there are several factors contributing to this issue of abusers finding safe haven in the Church.
For one, they seem very sincere when they preach.
This might seem like a minor point to make, but if you‚Äôve sat under a leader who preaches about holiness and prayer with emotional passion, it can be difficult to imagine that they are living a double life.
‚ÄúIf they were faking it, they wouldn‚Äôt be able to have so much emotion about it,‚Äù is the subconscious thought process most believers have ‚Äî and that‚Äôs absolutely true because they aren‚Äôt faking it!
I‚Äôm fully convinced that most of these leaders started out with a sincere devotion to Christ.
At some point in their journey, temptation came, and instead of resisting it, they gave in and the results of their sin are now being displayed for all to see.
While it‚Äôs easy to condemn the atrocious acts these people committed (and they are atrocious and should be condemned), I think it‚Äôs important to realize that the moment a leader arises with a legitimate anointing on their life, all of Hell puts a target on them and gives a green light for their minions to attack.
The devil will surround a genuine servant of God with those he‚Äôs enslaved to Hell, and initiate strategies to get them to slip and lose their footing.
Once they fall, they become trapped and in many cases, they are most likely blackmailed and told to do what the devil wants ‚Äúor else.‚Äù
Should a leader who‚Äôs been exposed of abuse be restored to leadership after years of systematic predatory patterns are uncovered? Almost never.
However, I doubt many people understand the level of pressure and demonic harassment these leaders endured for years and even decades before they gave in.
Would you or I do any better? I hope so. People often medicate their pain with sin.
Recent church history is replete with examples of leaders who weren‚Äôt abusive but were involved in affairs or other kinds of sin.
Surely the Christian walk is a marathon and not a sprint, with many eager to catch a leader in failure so that their own promotion can come. READ MORE

author: ZDF
title: Tunneleinsturz in Los Angeles: Alle Arbeiter unverletzt gerettet
text:
hallo deutschland
hallo deutschland - Tunnel-Einsturz in Los Angeles: Alle Arbeiter gerettet
hallo deutschland
Tunnel-Einsturz in Los Angeles: Alle Arbeiter gerettet
hallo deutschland
Tunnel-Einsturz in Los Angeles: Alle Arbeiter gerettet
- 10.07.2025
Aufatmen in Kalifornien: Nach dem Einsturz eines Tunnels bei Los Angeles, hat die Feuerwehr alle Eingeschlossenen gerettet. 31 Menschen sind ohne sichtbare Verletzungen wohlauf.
Tunnel-Einsturz in Los Angeles: Alle Arbeiter gerettet
- 10.07.2025
Aufatmen in Kalifornien: Nach dem Einsturz eines Tunnels bei Los Angeles, hat die Feuerwehr alle Eingeschlossenen gerettet. 31 Menschen sind ohne sichtbare Verletzungen wohlauf.
Es war ein gro√üer Rettungseinsatz. Nachdem Teile eines riesigen Tunnels bei Los Angeles eingest√ºrzt sind, schickte die Feuerwehr mehr als 100 Einsatzkr√§fte zum Ungl√ºcksort, darunter spezialisierte Rettungsteams.
Der Ungl√ºcksort befindet rund 30 Kilometer s√ºdlich des Zentrums von Los Angeles. Der Einsturz passierte mehr als acht Kilometer vom einzigen Tunneleingang entfernt.
Mit Transportk√§figen gerettet
Ersten Berichten zufolge, gelang es einigen Arbeitern nach dem Einsturz, durch einen Engpass zu quetschen. Die Eingeschlossenen seien mit einem Tunneltransportmittel zum Ausgang gebracht worden. Anschlie√üend wurden sie per Transportk√§fig aus dem Tunneleingang gehievt. Sanit√§ter versorgten die Geretteten.
"CBS News" vermeldete, dass die Arbeiter rund eine Stunde in dem Tunnel eingeschlossen waren. Der Tunnel soll die kommunale Abwasserentsorgung verbessern. Was die Ursache des Einsturzes war, wird nun ermittelt.

author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
title: How to watch solar eclipse, meteor showers and more in 2024
text: The night sky will have a multitude of delights in store for stargazers in 2024. Full moons and meteor showers will light up the sky. An increase in solar activity is expected to cause auroras that will create colorful displays. And eclipse chasers have been counting down to 2024 since the ‚ÄúGreat American Eclipse‚Äù of 2017 ‚Äî because a [total solar eclipse](https://www.cnn.com/2023/12/09/world/eclipse-myths-history-folklore-littman-book-scn/index.html) will travel across the United States in April. Many nights, there will be opportunities to [spot different planets](https://www.almanac.com/astronomy/planets-rise-and-set) or [look for the International Space Station](https://spotthestation.nasa.gov/) as it orbits Earth. Keep your telescopes and binoculars at the ready, and don‚Äôt forget to [snag a pair of eclipse glasses](https://www.cnn.com/2023/10/11/world/solar-eclipse-glasses-eye-protection-scn/index.html) so you can safely watch the total solar eclipse. People are also reading‚Ä¶ Full moons and supermoons Twelve full moons will occur during 2024, and September and October‚Äôs lunar events will also be considered supermoons, according to [EarthSky](https://earthsky.org/astronomy-essentials/what-is-a-supermoon/). Definitions of a supermoon can vary, but the term generally denotes a full moon that is closer to Earth than normal and thus appears larger and brighter in the night sky. Some astronomers say the phenomenon occurs when the moon is within 90% of perigee ‚Äî its closest approach to Earth in orbit. Each month‚Äôs full moon is associated with a specific name, according to the [Farmers‚Äô Almanac](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/full-moon-dates-and-times). But the full moons have a variety of names and meanings according to [different indigenous tribes](https://astro101.wwu.edu/indianmoons.html). Here are the full moons of 2024: Jan. 25: Wolf moon Feb. 24: Snow moon March 25: Worm moon April 23: Pink moon May 23: Flower moon June 21: Strawberry moon July 21: Buck moon Aug. 19: Sturgeon moon Sept. 17: Harvest moon Oct. 17: Hunter‚Äôs moon Nov. 15: Beaver moon Dec. 15: Cold moon Solar and lunar eclipses Multiple eclipses will occur in 2024, including two types of lunar eclipses and two types of solar eclipses, according to the [Old Farmer‚Äôs Almanac](https://www.almanac.com/eclipses). The most highly anticipated of these events is the [total solar eclipse occurring on April 8](https://www.cnn.com/2023/10/16/world/next-solar-eclipse-2024-scn/index.html), which will be visible to those in Mexico, the United States and Canada. A total solar eclipse occurs when the moon passes between Earth and the sun, completely blocking the sun‚Äôs face. Those within the path of totality, or locations where the moon‚Äôs shadow will completely cover the sun, will see a total solar eclipse. People outside the path of totality will still be able to see a partial solar eclipse, in which the moon only obscures part of the sun‚Äôs face. A total solar eclipse won‚Äôt be visible across the contiguous U.S. again until August 2044. An annular solar eclipse will occur in the sky on Oct. 2 over parts of South America. This type of eclipse is similar to a total solar eclipse, except the moon is at the farthest point in its orbit from Earth, so it can‚Äôt completely block the sun. Instead, annular solar eclipses create a ‚Äúring of fire‚Äù in the sky as the sun‚Äôs fiery light surrounds the moon‚Äôs shadow. Meanwhile, a penumbral lunar eclipse will be visible to many across Europe, North and East Asia, Australia, Africa, North America and South America between March 24-25. A lunar eclipse, which causes the moon to look dark or dimmed, occurs when the sun, Earth and moon align so that the moon passes into Earth‚Äôs shadow. A penumbral lunar eclipse is more subtle and happens when the moon moves through the outer shadow, or penumbra, of the Earth. A partial lunar eclipse, when the Earth moves between the sun and the full moon without being perfectly aligned, will appear over Europe and much of Asia, Africa, North America and South America between Sept. 17-18. Check [Time and Date‚Äôs website](https://www.timeanddate.com/eclipse/2024#:~:text=2024%20Featured%20Eclipses&text=Year%202024%20has%205%20eclipses,eclipses%20and%203%20lunar%20eclipses.) to see when each of these eclipses will appear. Solar activity and auroras The sun is expected to reach [solar maximum](https://www.cnn.com/2023/07/14/world/solar-maximum-activity-2024-scn/index.html), or the peak of its 11-year cycle of activity, in mid-to-late 2024. When the sun is active, it releases strong solar flares and coronal mass ejections, or large clouds of ionized gas called plasma and magnetic fields that erupt from the sun‚Äôs outer atmosphere. The solar storms generated by the sun can affect electric power grids, GPS and aviation, and satellites in low-Earth orbit. These events also cause radio blackouts and even pose risks for crewed space missions. The [Space Weather Prediction Center](https://www.swpc.noaa.gov/), operated by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration in Boulder, Colorado, will be closely monitoring the sun and release warnings and predictions about solar activity that could impact Earth. Scientists are eagerly anticipating what they could [learn about the sun‚Äôs activity by observing it](https://www.cnn.com/2023/06/23/world/2024-total-solar-eclipse-guide-scn/index.html) during April‚Äôs total solar eclipse. A more positive side effect of increased solar activity, however, is the auroras that dance around Earth‚Äôs poles, known as the northern lights, or aurora borealis, and southern lights, or aurora australis. When the energized particles from coronal mass ejections reach Earth‚Äôs magnetic field, they interact with gases in the atmosphere to create different colored lights in the sky. Geomagnetic storms driven by the sun in 2023 caused auroras to be visible in places where they are rarely seen, including as far south as New Mexico, Missouri, North Carolina and California in the United States, and the southeast of England and other parts of the United Kingdom. Depending on the location, the auroras may not always be visible overhead, but they create a colorful display on the horizon. Meteor showers The new year kicks off with a meteor shower almost immediately. The Quadrantid meteor shower is expected to peak between Jan. 3-4, according to [EarthSky](https://earthsky.org/astronomy-essentials/everything-you-need-to-know-quadrantid-meteor-shower/). After the Quadrantids, there‚Äôs a bit of a lull in meteor shower activity, and the next one won‚Äôt occur until April. Fortunately, there are plenty of celestial events to anticipate during the long wait. Here is the full list of meteor showers occurring in 2024, according to the [American Meteor Society](https://www.amsmeteors.org/meteor-showers/meteor-shower-calendar/). Quadrantids: Jan. 3-4 Lyrids: April 21-22 Eta Aquariids: May 4-5 Southern delta Aquariids: July 30-31 Alpha Capricornids: July 30-31 Perseids: Aug. 12-13 Draconids: Oct. 7-8 Orionids: Oct. 21-22 Southern Taurids: Nov. 5-6 Northern Taurids: Nov. 11-12 Leonids: Nov. 17-18 Geminids: Dec. 13-14 Ursids: Dec. 21-22 ___

author: Fernando Gabarr√≥
title: Cabo Verde saca billete para octavos goleando a la Mozambique de Reinildo con un zapatazo de Beb√©
text: Cabo Verde es la primera selecci√≥n clasificada para octavos tras golear a Mozambique (3-0), un triunfo que sumado a la victoria en primera jornada ante Ghana (1-2) le dan la clasificaci√≥n matem√°tica. Los 'tiburones azules' fueron mejores durante todo el encuentro, sin dar pr√°cticamente ninguna opci√≥n a los mozambique√±os. Beb√©, jugador del Rayo Vallecano y conocido en el f√∫tbol espa√±ol por su facilidad para armar el disparo desde larga distancia, se exhibi√≥ en su mejor virtud, el tiro. Primero prob√≥ con una falta directa desde m√°s de 30 metros, en este caso desde el sector izquierdo. No tuvo suerte, pues el bal√≥n se choc√≥ con el larguero. A la segunda, en este cas desde una distancia similar pero por la derecha, el ob√∫s super√≥ a Ernan. El portero, cariacontecido por el gol que hab√≠a encajado, le intentaba explicar a su compa√±ero Reinildo que el bal√≥n hab√≠a llegado movi√©ndose de un lado a otro. Es decir, hab√≠a ca√≠do en la trampa de Beb√© y su caracter√≠stico golpeo. En el 40 el colegiado Samir Guezzaz se√±al√≥ pena m√°xima a favor de Mozambique pero el VAR le avis√≥ para que revisara la acci√≥n y lo anul√≥. Segunda parte de sentenciar En el 51 Ryan Mendes aprovech√≥ un fallo de Dove para quedarse mano a mano y poner el 2-0, un resultado que viendo las dificultades de Mozambique para crear ocasiones parec√≠a definitivo. Tanto fue as√≠ que Cabo Verde se permiti√≥ el lujo de reservar a Beb√©, poco acostumbrado tantos minutos y tan seguidos. Geny Catamo, el joven de 22 a√±os del Sporting Club, l√≠der de la liga portuguesa, mand√≥ un lanzamiento de falta al larguero. Poco despu√©s, en el 69 Kevin Pina, jugador del Krasnodar marc√≥ con un potente disparo a la escuadra desde una distancia considerable. Parece que lo de probar suerte 'desde su casa' en Cabo Verde se lleva mucho. Cabo Verde es l√≠der del Grupo B con 6 puntos y ya clasificado para Octavos, como primeros adem√°s. Egipto con 2, Ghana y Mozambique con 1 se le jugar√°n en la √∫ltima jornada.

author: varkaha
title: #69 Milei elimina el organismo que investigaba el robo de ni√±os durante la dictadura argentina
text:
[luspagnolu](/user/luspagnolu)a [publico.es](/go/link/3969477) [#1](c1#c-1) Ahora se han humanizado, en lugar de robarlos proponen compr√°rselos, adem√°s prohibiendo el aborto y poniendo trabas a la educaci√≥n sexual tienen la producci√≥n asegurada.
[#1](c1#c-1) Es que no hay plata, y adem√°s, los ni√±os ya est√°n robados y no se van a destinar, as√≠ que ¬øpara qu√© gastarse la pasta?
A ver qu√© dice el subnormal de siempre respecto a esto. Seguro que es capaz de decir que esos ni√±os han sido vendidos y no puede pedirse su devoluci√≥n o algo similar.
[#6](c6#c-6) [#42](c42#c-42) [#46](c46#c-46)
En serio, por qu√© perd√©is el tiempo con esta gente? Bloqueo y a vivir. Est√°n aqu√≠ para joder, nada m√°s.
No os llega con Ana Rosa, la Griso, Ferreras, Losantos, Herrera, ABC, El Mundo, etc? Aqu√≠ ten√©is la oportunidad de taparles la boca a esta gentecilla que a saber por qu√© est√°n aqu√≠ diciendo estas chorradas
"Seg√∫n la organizaci√≥n pro derechos humanos Abuelas de Plaza de Mayo, cerca de 500 beb√©s fueron robados por la dictadura a sus progenitores, en su mayor√≠a opositores al r√©gimen. En muchos casos, sostiene la organizaci√≥n, las madres que dieron a luz en centros clandestinos de detenci√≥n y tortura, fueron desaparecidas para siempre, asesinadas o tiradas con vida al mar."
engendros del averno
[#52](c52#c-52) uff el cansino ese del mensaje kilom√©trico?
Ese tambi√©n est√° entre mis excepciones, igual que el que repet√≠a le mensaje en cada noticia del bitcoin.
Pero es que yo los insultos del calibre de este usuario es que deber√≠a estar baneado por el resto del los d√≠as.
[#37](c37#c-37) Pero a√∫n no tienes a ese ente en el ignore? si de cada 10 palabras 20 son insultos...
Luego preguntan porqu√© meneame se va al garete..
[#48](c48#c-48) No uso mucho el ignore, solo tengo a un usuario, el que no quiere hacer crecer a sus hijos en la miseria...
[#27](c27#c-27) La cuesti√≥n es si es necesario un organismo solo para eso o puede derivarse a otro ya existente.
[#29](c29#c-29) Vaya, qu√© sorpresa, uno de los seres con mayor nivel de miseria de esta web, y mira que el nivel es alto, alegr√°ndose de que no puedan investigarse los secuestros de ni√±os en una dictadura. Por lo que sea, eh?
Pues ya solo con el banco gen√©tico que ha creado ya tiene mayor utilidad que la que puedan tener 10000 seres como t√∫ en 10000 vidas.
[#31](c31#c-31) ¬øQui√©n se ha alegrado de nada?
Resultados, hay un estudio gen√©tico, ok, ¬øCuales son los resultados?
Tu si que eres miserable...
[#56](c56#c-56) Si tienes empat√≠a, dona a una ONG o asociaci√≥n que realice esa tarea. Que yo no quiera que esto sea financiado coercitivamente/via impuestos no significa en absoluto que est√© en contra de que se realice la tarea, de forma privada.
La empat√≠a, con el dinero propio, no con el ajeno.
El gobierno dice que el organismo actuaba "por iniciativa propia, para la individualizaci√≥n de los responsables de posibles hechos criminales"
A los que defienden la libertad no les gusta que los organismos sean independientes, sobre todo estos organismos que TIENEN LA OBLIGACION de ser independientes de cualquier gobierno o ideolog√≠a pol√≠tica.
Espero que alguien viole la LOPD y ponga esos archivos a salvo
[#70](c70#c-70) El liberalismo se basa en la moral como principio b√°sico, as√≠ que dif√≠cil. M√°s f√°cil si eres socialista o fascista, que viene a ser lo mismo.
[#53](c53#c-53) Lo que t√∫ digas, se ha pagado de impuestos por 40 a√±os la investigaci√≥n de todo esto, m√°s que suficiente.
40 a√±os despu√©s de la dictadura y despu√©s de 20 a√±os de trabajo la verdad que ya deber√≠an haber resuelto el tema... o la cuesti√≥n es perpetuarse como organismo? En Argentina no sobra el dinero p√∫blico y deben recortar si quieren seguir teniendo un pa√≠s habitable, pero algunos piensan que imprimiendo dinero se solucionaria todo, como los ni√±os de 5 a√±os...
[#23](c23#c-23) Es lo que sospecho, se centran en el n√∫mero de ni√±os robados, los que reconocen ciertos organismos y los que reconoce el gobierno, pero ¬øy los logros de este organismo? ¬øcu√°l es la justificaci√≥n del gasto? ¬øHay que soltar billetes aunque no haya resultados?
[#4](c4#c-4) Ni de ti me esperaba defender semejante indignidad. Tiempo suficiente es todo el necesario para la resoluci√≥n de todos los casos de un crimen tan atroz como es robar seres humanos. Y son cientos.
[#10](c10#c-10) Semejante personaje despreciable. Como si fuera una "investigaci√≥n" que tarda un tiempo concreto. Es un organismo que se encarga de hacer pruebas de ADN a la poblaci√≥n para buscar familiares cercanos de gente que en la mayor√≠a de los casos es por sospecha que puede ser un ni√±o robado o los familiares terminan confesando...
No se puede caer m√°s bajo que defender algo as√≠.
[#10](c10#c-10) No s√© c√≥mo te aguantas y llamas simplemente ¬´indigno¬ª a un saco de mierda as√≠. En serio, todo mi respeto a tu templanza
[#4](c4#c-4) Han tenido 20 a√±os para investigar eso
Eso no es completamente cierto. En el art√≠culo dicen claramente que fue fundada en el 92. No han tenido 20 a√±os, han tenido 30.
Y teniendo en cuenta que 10 a√±os antes ya estaba la Comisi√≥n Nacional por la Desaparici√≥n de Personas que hac√≠a lo mismo y cuyas funciones luego asumi√≥ el organismo que ha cerrado Milei, en realidad han tenido 40 a√±os.
[#28](c28#c-28) Hace 40 a√±os no habia la capacidad de hacer tests gen√©ticos en cantidad, disponibilidad y coste como la que hay ahora.
[#38](c38#c-38) Las pruebas gen√©ticas para investigar la filiaci√≥n con personas desaparecidas las lleva el Banco Nacional de Datos Gen√©ticos y son gratuitas. Para quien tiene sospechas de ser hijo/a de alg√∫n desaparecido, quien realmente resuelve el tema es est√° organizaci√≥n, a la que cualquiera puede acudir y que adem√°s lo hace de forma gratuita. No necesitas a√±adir una capa de burocracia adicional en forma de otra organizaci√≥n.
https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banco_Nacional_de_Datos_Gen√©ticos
[#4](c4#c-4) Te voy a poner un ejemplo: Espa√±a
Aqu√≠ hemos tenido 50 a√±os (y contando) y todav√≠a hay un mont√≥n de barbaridades que se hicieron en la dictadura de Franco que siguen sin saberse.
Y eso es as√≠ porque todav√≠a hay gente viva y con poder, interesada en que no se sepa.
Y en Argentina, igual. Y esa gente con poder ha votado a Milei para que parara esas investigaciones, no sea que se descubra que alg√∫n heredero de una familia de bien resulta que tiene genes de rojo piojoso.
[#30](c30#c-30) Precisamente. Este es de los que dice que no hay que reabrir heridas del pasado obviando que los delitos de lesa humanidad no prescriben
[#50](c50#c-50) Viniendo del t√≠o que llama fascistas a los que piden acabar con los difusores de fake news racistas, en realidad tu opini√≥n respecto a esto se pod√≠a intuir. Has confirmado lo que pareces esmerarte en demostrar cada d√≠a; das asco. No eres m√°s que otro ultra conservador sin escr√∫pulos, como tu m√°ximo h√©roe, el soci√≥pata Milei.

author: Joey Sneddon
title: Ubuntu 24.04 Beta Released, This is What's New - OMG! Ubuntu
text:
The Ubuntu 24.04 beta is now available to download ‚Äî one week later than originally planned!
Ubuntu 24.04 will become the next long-term support release (LTS) and this beta will provide developers, testers, and enthusiasts time to try it out, track down bugs, and road test its new features.
Beta releases are not intended for everyday use (i.e. you‚Äôre not supposed to install it as your main OS or on machines you rely on) but, that said, many folks do.
The Noble development cycle hasn‚Äôt been without its dramas and hiccups.
Devs undertook the largest library transition in Ubuntu‚Äôs history (to mitigate the ‚Äòyear 2038 problem‚Äô), and the recent discover of obfuscated, malicious code in the Xz compression library meant every binary package in the Noble repos had to be rebuilt (hence the beta delay).
But chances are you‚Äôre not here to hear about all of that ; you‚Äôre here to hear about what‚Äôs new.
And there‚Äôs a fair bit.
Ubuntu 24.04 Beta in Brief Ubuntu 24.04 Beta build Most people who upgrade to Ubuntu 24.04 LTS will do so from the previous long-term support release, Ubuntu 22.04 LTS. As such, the cumulative total of ‚Äúnew features‚Äù will encompass not only the things added between 23.10 -> 24.04 but everything added since 22.10.
I plan to run-through the cumulative feature set in a separate post as most people who read this site (hello ü§≠) who are interested in testing a beta release are likely to be familiar with/coming from an interim release ‚Äî making those ‚Äònew‚Äô features ‚Äòold‚Äô news!
What follows is an overview of the notable changes since Ubuntu 23.10, which was released last October. If you use that release then all of the stuff below will be new to you.
Installer Improvements Automated installation is now possible
Ubuntu‚Äôs Flutter-based installer has been revamped with refreshed visuals and more intelligible text descriptions; the order of installation steps has been adjusted; and a new panel for configuring accessibility needs introduced.
Most notable, Ubuntu‚Äôs updated installer begins a new approach to installation based on the concept of ‚Äúprovisioning‚Äù. As part of this, the Ubuntu 24.04 installer allows users to open a .yaml file containing a pre-filled configuration in order to automate deployment.
App Changes GNOME Games are gone Since 23.10, Ubuntu defaults to a ‚Äòminimal‚Äô install with only a small set of ‚Äòessential‚Äô software preinstalled. Those needing a fully-stocked offline-friendly install with apps like LibreOffice , Rhythmbox , GNOME Calendar , etc must choose ‚ÄòExtended Selection‚Äô in the installer.
Ubuntu 24.04 makes changes to the apps in the extended install:
Cheese webcam app replaced by Snapshot GNOME games removed Thunderbird e-mail client now a snap package Otherwise, everything is as it was and every app has been updated to the latest version including the latest LibreOffice 24.2 series and the latest Transmission 4.0 release. This should ensure you don‚Äôt need to hunt down PPAs, Flatpaks, etc for newer builds for a while!
GNOME 46 (some) notifications can now be expanded/collapsed Ubuntu 24.04 ships with the recent GNOME 46 release, a sizeable update delivering a wealth of improvements throughout the entire desktop.
There‚Äôs a set of super-charged new Nautilus search features ; a reorganised Settings app with new panels and options; collapsable notifications in GNOME Shell; support for remote login over RDP ; faster search in the GNOME Shell overview, and more.
Welcome updates.
Foundational Changes Performance tooling is now preinstalled in noble builds Ubuntu 24.04 uses Linux kernel 6.8 , the latest version at the time of release.
This offers a ton of improvements and enablements, but a few notable things: Intel ‚ÄòMeteor Lake‚Äô CPUs now hit their advertised boost speeds; Nintendo Switch Online controller support; RFI mitigations to remedy Wi-Fi issues on some AMD laptops; and zswap buffs.
The network stack has been updated to Netplan 1.0 , enabling support for simultaneous WPA2 & WPA3 connections, Mellanox VF-LAG, improving VXLAN, and providing a stable libnetplan1 API .
Ubuntu 24.04 changes at-a-glance:
Desktop installer updates GNOME 46 w/ updated apps Power efficiency improvements Big gaming boost Linux kernel 6.8.11 Mesa 24.0.3 Netplan 1.0 Performance tooling is now preinstalled GNOME Games package removed (full install) GNOME Snapshot replaces Cheese (full install) Thunderbird e-mail client is now a snap package (full install) A few things to be aware of when upgrading (from any version):
You still can‚Äôt install DEB packages using App Center Thunderbird DEB now a transition package which installs the snap The new Flutter-based Desktop Security Center tool in testing earlier in this development cycle isn‚Äôt present (not a surprise; there‚Äôs been little development on it in recent weeks).
Download Ubuntu 24.04 Beta You can download the Ubuntu 24.04 Beta from the Ubuntu release server right now for 64-bit Intel/AMD devices (a weighty 5GB in size). A pre-installed image for Raspberry Pi 4 & 5 is also available to download.
And before you ask, yes: you can upgrade from Ubuntu beta to the final release. Simply install all updates released between now and then. By release day you will have the same set of packages as anyone doing a clean install (and likely a pinch of cruft they don‚Äôt).
Like Ubuntu but with a different flavour? Beta builds of official Ubuntu flavours are also available for testing from today too.
To upgrade to Ubuntu 24.04 from Ubuntu 22.04 you‚Äôll need to wait until June unless you‚Äôre willing to use the command line. This is because Canonical only begin notifying LTS users of an upgrade once the first point release is made (and thus, the update is even more stable).

author: India Education Diary Bureau Admin
title: Skilling is more than just a certificate, it is life-long learning: Jayant Chaudhary
text:
New Delhi : Shri Jayant Chaudhary, Minister of State (Independent Charge), Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship (MSDE), addressed a zonal conference for Jan Shikshan Sansthan (JSS) at Chaudhary Charan Singh University, Meerut, today. The aim is to create awareness about outreach and the efficacy of JSS in creating self-employment and wage employment opportunities among socio-economically backward groups through skill development training. Moving beyond traditional skills, the conference also emphasized on the relevance of futuristic, industry-relevant skills and their role in better preparing individuals for the evolving job market. The honourable minister also inaugurated the exhibition of products made by JSS candidate from Delhi and UP and interacted with beneficiaries.
The Jan Shikshan Sansthan (JSS) Scheme, originally launched as Shramik Vidyapeeth (SVP) in 1967, is a transformative initiative designed to provide skill training through registered Societies (NGOs) with full funding from the Government of India. This pioneering scheme targets non-literates, neo-literates, individuals with rudimentary education, and school dropouts up to class 12th, aged 15-45 years. By offering flexible, affordable, and accessible skill training, JSSs have become a lifeline for women, Scheduled Castes (SC), Scheduled Tribes (ST), Other Backward Classes (OBCs), minorities, and other disadvantaged groups in society.
Currently, over 290 JSSs are functional in 26 States and 7 UTs including 47 in Uttar Pradesh (UP) and 3 in Delhi. Since the transfer of the scheme from the Ministry of Education (Erstwhile MHRD) to MSDE in July 2018, a total of 26.37 Lakh beneficiaries have been trained under the JSS scheme. The qualified beneficiaries consist of educationally disadvantaged and economically backward groups in rural and urban slums. In line with the key objectives of the scheme, many trained beneficiaries are women 21.63 Lakh (82.02%).
Speaking on the progress, Shri Jayant Chaudhary, Minister of State (Independent Charge), Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship (MSDE), said ‚Äú‚ÄùAligned with the Prime Minister‚Äôs vision, we are dedicated to providing better opportunities for the youth of India. Under the JSS scheme, we aim to enhance capacity building and expand skill development opportunities among low-income groups. The processes of skilling, reskilling, and upskilling are essential for personal and economic growth. I applaud the JSS for recognizing the skilled workforce gap in various sectors and acting as a bridge builder, connecting talent with opportunity.‚Äù
‚ÄúThe PMKVY scheme has already benefited over 97,000 people from Meerut and 1.4 crore individuals across India. Also, NAPS (National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS) apprenticeship program plays a vital role in encouraging the employees to enhance their skill to match the ever-evolving industry requirements.‚Äù he added.
Shri Atul Kumar Tiwari, Secretary, Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship, Government of India, added , ‚ÄúI recognize and commend the outstanding work of JSS in empowering the low-income communities in India. Through their strong community connections, JSS has been training the youth, especially women, in industry-relevant skills like marketing to not only increase their employability but also to bring about their holistic empowerment. I encourage them to continue this invaluable work and promote strong livelihood opportunities.‚Äù
Shri Kapil Dev Aggarwal, MoS (IC), Vocational Education and Skill Development Department, Govt. of UP. Member of Legislative Assembly from Muzaffarnagar Constituency , said ‚ÄúOur Honorable Prime Minister‚Äôs focus on skill development is unwavering. He consistently highlights the crucial role skilling plays in the growth of our nation. The National Education Policy 2020 emphasized the importance of vocational training, urging it to be embraced across levels from secondary education to high degrees. I acknowledge JSSs‚Äô remarkable work in making skilling available to low-income groups. I persuade our young generation to adopt vocational studies and become job providers from job seekers for a better tomorrow.‚Äù
A key strength of the JSS Scheme lies in its community connect and the involvement of local administration, village functionaries, and other stakeholders. This ensures effective mobilization of infrastructure, resources, and beneficiaries, enabling them to seek various job opportunities in various sectors such as food processing, textile, IT and more. Additionally, JSSs conduct activities to raise awareness on critical social, economic, health, financial literacy, and environmental issues.
The Zonal Conference served as a platform for sharing best practices, addressing challenges, and strategizing for the future. These conferences aim to enhance the implementation and outreach of the JSS Scheme, ensuring it continues to empower the targeted communities effectively.
In the previous financial year, the Ministry conducted Zonal Conferences from 13th March to 22nd March, 2024, at four diverse locations: Hyderabad, Goa, Udaipur, and Guwahati. These conferences reviewed the performance of JSSs and gathered valuable feedback and suggestions for improving the scheme‚Äôs outcomes.
